About Our Team

Westview Badminton team became an official sport at Westview High School in 2018. A group of students who were running the badminton club and were playing at state level, convinced the school authorities of their potential to be an official team and gathered enough interest int the student community that about a hundred students showed up for tryouts inn the first year itself. The scholl finally approved and the team was given a go.

Performance Standing

Westview Wolverines are currently ranked No. 2, in Division C, right behind last years winners Serra High. In their first year of being a team , they moved to number 1 in Western league and to number 2 in second year in the eastern league.

View the winners of CIF over the years CIF champions

Our Team Leaders

  1. Head Coach

    Coach Tommy Ho, is the lead coach who has been playing badminton for over 20 years. He is also the lead coach at SDBCC and gratefully agreed to become the official coach of Westview High Badminton Team in 2019.

  2. Team Captains

    The team is led by captains Carston, Bryan, Dhruti and Kyle. They were instrumental in gaining a status of a team from a club.

  3. Team Manager

    2019 was coach Tommy's first year coaching a high school team and he needed all the help could get. Jonathan stepped up and has been a great support to the coach in running and organizing team activities.
